DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the efficacy and safety of denosumab in the treatment of involutional (postmenopausal and senile) osteoporotic subjects with prevalent fragility vertebral fracture(s)
DOC.brief_title: Denosumab Fracture Intervention Randomized Placebo Controlled Trial in Japanese Patients With Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Involutional (postmenopausal and senile) osteoporosis with prevalent fragility vertebral fractures Any underlying condition,(other than BMD) that might have resulted in abnormal bone metabolism
